CVE-2010-0011.title: uzbl eval_js function command execution
CVE-2010-0011.body: uzbl could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the disclosure of the run method of the Uzbl object by the eval_js function within uzbl-core.c. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using JavaScript code to execute arbitrary commands on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of uzbl (2010.01.05 or later), available from the uzbl Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0012.title: Transmission name directory traversal
CVE-2010-0012.body: Transmission could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by the improper validation of the "name" key prior to saving files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .torrent file containing directory traversal sequences, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to traverse directories and overwrite arbitrary local files on the system with the privileges of the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of Transmission (1.77 or later), available from the Transmission Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0027.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer URL code execution
CVE-2010-0027.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute code on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input sent to the ShellExecute API function. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted URL, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute a binary from the local client system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0036.title: Apple Mac OS X CoreAudio mp4 buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0036.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing mp4 files by the CoreAudio component. By persuading a victim to play a specially-crafted mp4 file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2010-001, available from the Apple Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0037.title: Apple Mac OS X Image RAW DNG image buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0037.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing DNG image files by the Image RAW component. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted DNG image file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply Apple Security Update 2010-001, available from the Apple Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0040.title: Apple Safari ColorSync buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0040.body: Apple Safari is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow when processing embedded ColorSync profiles. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted image containing an embedded ColorSync profile, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (4.0.5 or later), available from the Apple Safari Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0050.title: Apple Safari nested HTML tags code execution
CVE-2010-0050.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error in the WebKit component when handling incorrectly nested HTML tags. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Website, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of Safari (4.0.5 or later), available from the Apple Safari Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0097.title: ISC BIND DNSSEC NSEC/NSEC3 cache poisoning
CVE-2010-0097.body: ISC BIND could allow a remote attacker to poison the DNS cache, caused by an error in the DNSSEC NSEC/NSEC3 validation code. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by circumventing transaction ID and source port randomization to cause invalid NXDOMAIN responses to be cached resulting in the resolver returning queries with the AD flag set.Upgrade to the latest version of ISC BIND (9.4.3-P5, 9.5.2-P2, 9.6.1-P3 or later), available from the Internet Software Consortium (ISC) Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0107.title: Symantec ActiveX control (SYMLTCOM.dll) buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0107.body: The Symantec ActiveX control (SYMLTCOM.dll) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to SYM10-003 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0108.title: Symantec Client Proxy ActiveX control (CLIproxy.dll) buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0108.body: The Symantec Client Proxy ActiveX control (CLIproxy.dll) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to SYM10-004 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0110.title: Multiple Symantec products Intel AMS2 component buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0110.body: Multiple Symantec products are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the Intel AMS2 component. By sending specially-crafted packets to TCP port 38292, a remote attacker from within the local network could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to SYM11- 002 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0111.title: Multiple Symantec products Intel AMS2 component denial of service
CVE-2010-0111.body: Multiple Symantec products are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Intel AMS2 component. By sending specially-crafted packets to TCP port 38292, a remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to crash the Intel Alert Handler service.Refer to SYM11- 003 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0111.title: Multiple Symantec products Intel AMS2 component code execution
CVE-2010-0111.body: Multiple Symantec products could allow a remote attacker from within the local network to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the Intel AMS2 component. By sending specially-crafted messages to TCP port 38292, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to create arbitrary events or execute code on the system.Refer to SYM11- 003 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0112.title: Symantec IM Manager multiple SQL injection
CVE-2010-0112.body: Symantec IM Manager is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the rdpageimlogic.aspx, DetailReportGroup.lgx, SummaryReportGroup.lgx, LoggedInUSers.lgx, IMAdminReportTrendFormRun.asp and IMAdminScheduleReport.asp scripts using multiple parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to SYM10-010 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0114.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection fw_charts.php code execution
CVE-2010-0114.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection reporting module could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper checks by the fw_charts.php script. If the SEP Client is installed and authenticated to a SEP Server, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite arbitrary PHP files on reporting module and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to SYM10-013 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0115.title: Symantec Web Gateway USERNAME SQL injection
CVE-2010-0115.body: Symantec Web Gateway is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.php script in the management interface using the USERNAME parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to SYM11-001 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0116.title: RealPlayer SP QCP buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0116.body: RealPlayer SP is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow when parsing QCP files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted QCP file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of RealPlayer SP (1.1.5 or later), available from the RealNetworks Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0120.title: RealPlayer SP QCP audio content buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0120.body: RealPlayer SP is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing QCP audio content. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted QCP file containing overly large size values, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of RealPlayer SP (1.1.5 or later), available from the RealNetworks Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0122.title: Employee Timeclock Software auth.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0122.body: Employee Timeclock Software is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the auth.php and login_action.php scripts using the username or password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0123.title: Employee Timeclock Software database information disclosure
CVE-2010-0123.body: Employee Timeclock Software could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of the database backup with a semi-predictable file name by the database backup functionality. By sending a direct request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to guess the file name and obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0138.title: CiscoWorks IPM CORBA buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0138.body: CiscoWorks Internetwork Performance Monitor (IPM) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing Common Object Request Broker Architecture (CORBA) GIOP requests. By sending a specially-crafted CORBA GIOP request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Refer to cisco-sa-20100120-ipm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0146.title: Cisco Security Agent Management Center directory traversal
CVE-2010-0146.body: Cisco Security Agent Management Center could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted request using unknown vectors to view and download arbitrary files on the system.Refer to cisco-sa-20100217-csa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0147.title: Cisco Security Agent Management Center SQL injection
CVE-2010-0147.body: Cisco Security Agent Management Center is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to using unknown vectors, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to cisco-sa-20100217-csa for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0160.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey Web Workers code execution
CVE-2010-0160.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an implementation error of Web Workers while handling array data types when processing posted messages. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or crash the browser.Refer to MFSA 2010-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0161.title: Mozilla Thunderbird and SeaMonkey Active Directory denial of service
CVE-2010-0161.body: Mozilla Thunderbird and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when attached to an Active Directory server running on Microsoft Vista or Windows 7. If SSPI authentication is used, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the browser or possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to MFSA 2010-07 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0162.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey SVG cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0162.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions and conduct cross-site scripting attacks, caused by an error when processing an embedded SVG document with a Content-Type of application/octet-stream. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions and execute JavaScript in the context of another domain hosting the SVG document. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Refer to MFSA 2010-05 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0175.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey nsTreeSelection code execution
CVE-2010-0175.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error in the nsTreeSelection interface related to a select event handler for XUL tree items. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.Refer to MFSA 2010-17 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0176.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey nsTreeContentView code execution
CVE-2010-0176.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a dangling pointer in the nsTreeContentView when inserting "option" elements into a XUL tree "optgroup". By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.Refer to MFSA 2010-18 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0177.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey nsPluginArray code execution
CVE-2010-0177.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a dangling pointer in nsPluginArray when handling "window.navigator.plugins" object. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.Refer to MFSA 2010-19 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0178.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when handling browser applets. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and interact with the site via a mouse click, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform a drag and drop action to execute arbitrary code on the system with chrome privileges.Refer to MFSA 2010-20 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0181.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey mailto: URL weak security
CVE-2010-0181.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error when an image tag pointing to a resource redirects to a mailto: URL. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a malicious image tag, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to open the email editor application.Refer to MFSA 2010-23 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0182.title: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey and Thunderbird XMLDocument::load() weak security
CVE-2010-0182.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey and Thunderbird could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the failure to check nsIContentPolicy by the XMLDocument::load() method. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to load restricted resources.Refer to MFSA 2010-24 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0185.title: Adobe ColdFusion Solr Service information disclosure
CVE-2010-0185.body: Adobe ColdFusion could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to restrict access to collections created by the Solr Service. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specific URL to gain unauthorized access to the collections to search and index sensitive information.Refer to APSB10-04 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0204.title: Adobe Reader and Acrobat unspecified code execution
CVE-2010-0204.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat related to improper input validation could allow an attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service using unknown attack vectors.Refer to APSB10-09 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0214.title: RoomWizard password security bypass
CVE-2010-0214.body: RoomWizard could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. The Web based scheduling system has a default password. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information and gain unauthorized access to the device.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0216.body: MediaCAST could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the authenticate_ad_setup_finished.cfm script. By sending a specially-crafted GET request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to disclose user credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of MediaCAST, available from the Inventive Technology Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0217.title: Zeacom Chat Server JSESSIONID session hijacking
CVE-2010-0217.body: Zeacom Chat Server could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by the improper handling of session data. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site containing a malicious JSESSIONID cookie value, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack another user's account and gain the victim's privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Chat Server (5.1 or later), available from the Zeacom Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0220.title: Mozilla Firefox nsObserverList::FillObserverArray denial of service
CVE-2010-0220.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the nsObserverList::FillObserverArray function within nsObserverList.cpp. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted Web site that causes the consumption of memory resources accompanied by a Low Memory alert dialog and the removal of an observer from an empty observers array to crash the application.Upgrade to the latest version of Firefox (3.5.7 or later), available from the Mozilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0221.title: Kingston DataTraveler secure flash drives access control security bypass
CVE-2010-0221.body: Multiple Kingston DataTraveler secure flash drive could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the access control mechanisms. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the password validation process and gain unauthorized access to restricted data.Refer to the Kingston Web Site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0232.title: Microsoft Windows #GP trap handler privilege escalation
CVE-2010-0232.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the #GP trap handler when setting up a VDM context. By setting up a specially-crafted VDM_TIB in their TEB using the #GP trap handler (nt!KiTrap0D), a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0244.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer deleted object code execution
CVE-2010-0244.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when attempting to access a deleted or improperly initialized object. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0245.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer initialized memory code execution
CVE-2010-0245.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when attempting to access a deleted or uninitialized object. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0246.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer deleted object code execution
CVE-2010-0246.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when attempting to access a deleted or uninitialized object. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0247.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer uninitialized code execution
CVE-2010-0247.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when attempting to access a deleted or uninitialized object. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0248.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer object memory code execution
CVE-2010-0248.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when attempting to access a deleted or uninitialized object. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0249.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer freed object code execution
CVE-2010-0249.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access an invalid pointer associated with a deleted object to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0271.title: Sun OpenSolaris hald weak security
CVE-2010-0271.body: Sun OpenSolaris could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an error in the hald daemon. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the daemon to stop writing audit records.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 274830 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0284.title: Novell Access Manager Administration Console getEntry file upload
CVE-2010-0284.body: Novell Access Manager could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by a directory traversal vulnerability in the PortalModuleInstallManager component of the Novell Access Management Console which exists within the servlet located within nps.jar. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to create or upload a malicious file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Novell Document ID: 7006255 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0288.title: DokuWiki ajax.php security bypass
CVE-2010-0288.body: DokuWiki could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper restrictions on the ajax.php script. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify or delete wiki permissions.Upgrade to the latest version of DokuWik (2009-12-25b or later), available from the DokuWik Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0295.title: lighttpd slow request denial of service
CVE-2010-0295.body: lighttpd is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper heap memory management when processing individual network packets. By sending a slow data request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume all available memory resources.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (lighttpd -1.4.x_fix_slow_request_dos.patch), available from the lighttpd Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0296.title: GNU C Library encode_name macro denial of service
CVE-2010-0296.body: GNU C Library is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of newline characters in mountpoint names by encode_name macro in misc/mntent_r.c. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted request to cause a denial of service or possibly launch further attacks on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0297.title: Linux Kernel USB buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0297.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the usb_host_handle_control() function. By sending a specially-crafted USB packet, a local attacker with access to the KVM guest OS could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the guest OS to hang.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0301.title: maildrop group privilege escalation
CVE-2010-0301.body: maildrop could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by improper restrictions set on supplementary groups when compiled without RESET_GID. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges and perform arbitrary tasks on the application with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of maildrop, available from the maildrop Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0303.title: Hybserv2 private message denial of service
CVE-2010-0303.body: Hybserv2 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing private messages. By sending a specially-crafted private message containing ":help \t" to the MemoServ service, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the service to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0304.title: Wireshark LWRES buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0304.body: Wireshark (formerly known as Ethereal) is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking by the LWRES dissector. By persuading a victim to load a specially-crafted trace file or by sending malicious packets, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to wnpa-sec-2010-02 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0305.title: ejabberd client2server denial of service
CVE-2010-0305.body: ejabberd is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the client2server message queue. By sending multiple client2server messages, a remote attacker could overload the c2s message queue and cause the node to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of ejabberd (2.1.3 or later), available from the ProcessOne Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0308.title: Squid DNS packet denial of service
CVE-2010-0308.body: Squid is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an assertion error when processing DNS packets. By sending specially-crafted DNS packets, a remote attacker with knowledge of the Squid receiving port, could exploit this vulnerability to cause an interruption of service.Refer to Squid Proxy Cache Security Update Advisory SQUID-2010:1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0317.title: Novell Netware AFPTCP.nlm denial of service
CVE-2010-0317.body: Novell Netware is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the AFPTCP.nlm module. By sending a specially-crafted AFP request to TCP port 548, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0319.title: Docmint CMS index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0319.body: Docmint CMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0321.title: Jamit Job Board index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0321.body: Jamit Job Board is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the post_id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0356.title: Movie Player Pro SDK ActiveX control DrawText() buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0356.body: The Movie Player Pro SDK ActiveX control (MoviePlayer.ocx) is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page that passes an overly long strFontName argument to the DrawText() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0364.title: VLC Media Player Advanced SubStation Alpha Subtitle (.ass) file buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0364.body: VLC Media Player is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing Advanced SubStation Alpha Subtitle (.ass) files. By persuading a victim to open an .ogg file containing an associated specially-crafted .ass subtitle file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of VLC Media Player (1.0.5 or later), available from the VLC Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0365.title: Bits Video Script search.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0365.body: Bits Video Script is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the search.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the order parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0366.title: Bits Video Script addvideo.php file upload
CVE-2010-0366.body: Bits Video Script could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the addvideo.php and register.php scripts. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0367.title: Bits Video Script showcasesearch.php file include
CVE-2010-0367.body: Bits Video Script could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the showcasesearch.php and showcase2search.php scripts using the rowptem[template] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0371.title: Hitmaaan Gallery index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0371.body: Hitmaaan Gallery is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the gall or levela parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0373.title: libros component for Joomla! index.php SQL inejction
CVE-2010-0373.body: The libros component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0374.body: The Marketplace component for Joomla! is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the catid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0375.title: JCE-Tech PHP Calendars product_list.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0375.body: JCE-Tech PHP Calendars is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the product_list.php script using the cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0376.title: JCE-Tech PHP Calendars product_list.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0376.body: JCE-Tech PHP Calendars is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the product_list.php and install.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the cat parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0387.title: Sun Java System Web Server Authorization: Digest header buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0387.body: Sun Java System Web Server is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the webservd and admin server. By sending an overly long request in an Authorization: Digest header, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Sun Java System Web Server (7.0 Release 8 or later), available from the Sun Java Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0392.title: TheGreenBow IPSec VPN Client .tgb buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0392.body: TheGreenBow is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by vpnconf.exe when processing .tgb policy files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .tgb file containing an overly long string in the OpenScriptAfterUp variable and then to make a configuration change while the file is open, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (vpnconf.exe), available from the TheGreenBow Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0394.title: trac-git plugin for Trac command execution
CVE-2010-0394.body: An unspecified error in the trac-git plugin for Trac could allow a remote attacker with permissions to browse the repository to execute arbitrary commands on the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0396.title: dpkg dpkg-source component directory traversal
CVE-2010-0396.body: dpkg could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system, caused by an error in the dpkg-source component. By persuading a victim to install a specially-crafted Debian source package an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to traverse directories and modify arbitrary files.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0403.title: phpGroupWare about.php file include
CVE-2010-0403.body: phpGroupWare could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the about.php script using the app parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of phpGroupWare (0.9.16.016 or later), available from the phpGroupWare Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0419.title: Linux Kernel segment selectors privilege escalation
CVE-2010-0419.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the KVM subsystem x86 emulator when loading segment selectors. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain privileges on the guest OS or cause it to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0420.title: Pidgin libpurple XMPP nickname denial of service
CVE-2010-0420.body: Pidgin libpurple is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a vulnerability when parsing XMPP group chat room nicknames. By inserting a specially-crafted HTML-encoded character into a MUC nickname, a remote attacker could cause Finch to crash.Refer to Pidgin Security Advisory 2010-02-18 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0423.title: Pidgin smileys denial of service
CVE-2010-0423.body: Pidgin is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the display feature. By inserting an overly large number of smileys into an IM or chat window, a remote attacker could cause Pidgin to hang.Refer to Pidgin Security Advisory 2010-02-18 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0434.title: Apache HTTP Server request header information disclosure
CVE-2010-0434.body: Apache HTTP Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper handling of headers in subrequests when a multithreaded MPM is used. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause an information leak from other requests being handled by a different thread.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache HTTP Server (2.2.15-dev or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0442.title: PostgreSQL SUBSTRING buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0442.body: PostgreSQL is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By sending a specially-crafted SELECT SUBSTRING query, a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the database to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0443.title: HP OpenVMS RMS privilege escalation
CVE-2010-0443.body: HP OpenVMS could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the ALPHA platform RMS (Record Management Services) patch kits. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Refer to HPSBOV02505 SSRT100023 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0451.title: HP-UX ONCplus package weak security
CVE-2010-0451.body: HP-UX could provide weaker than expected security. The NFS_SERVER configuration option is mistakenly set regardless of the original setting by the ONCplus package, which allows the enablement of NFS.Refer to HPSBUX02509 SSRT100032 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0453.title: Sun Solaris microcode denial of service
CVE-2010-0453.body: Sun Solaris is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference within the microcode device. By sending a specially-crafted UCODE_GET_VERSION IOCTL request, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the kernel to panic.Refer to Sun Alert ID: 143913-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0455.title: PunBB viewtopic.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0455.body: PunBB is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the viewtopic.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the pid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0456.title: Game Server component for Joomla! grp parameter SQL injection
CVE-2010-0456.body: The Game Server component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the grp parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0457.title: magic-portal home.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0457.body: magic-portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the home.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0458.body: NetArt Blog System is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the blog.php script using the user parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0458.body: Blog System is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the note or cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0459.title: Mochigames component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0459.body: The Mochigames component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Mochigames (0.52 ALPHA or later), available from the Yp Flash! Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0460.title: Kayako SupportSuite contents cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0460.body: Kayako SupportSuite is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the subject or contents parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of eSupport (3.70.01 or later), available from the Kayako Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0461.title: casino component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0461.body: The casino component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with administrative access could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0462.title: IBM DB2 SYSIBM buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0462.body: IBM DB2 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By sending a specially-crafted SELECT REPEAT query to a SYSIBM table, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the database server to crash.Refer to IBM APAR IC65922 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0463.title: Horde IMP DNS information disclosure
CVE-2010-0463.body: Horde IMP could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. Browser DNS prefetching of email domain names is not prevented. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by logging DNS requests to determine the network location of Web mail users.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0467.title: ccNewsletter component for Joomla! index.php directory traversal
CVE-2010-0467.body: The ccNewsletter component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the controller parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of ccNewsletter component for Joomla! (1.0.6 or later), available from the Chill Creations Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0468.title: CommonSpot Server longproc.cfm cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0468.body: CommonSpot Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by longproc.cfm. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the url parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0469.title: F2L 3000 login SQL injection
CVE-2010-0469.body: F2L 3000 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login page, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Current customers should access Files2Links Web site for patch or update information. See References.

CVE-2010-0475.title: Palo Alto Networks firewall editUser.esp cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0475.body: Palo Alto Networks firewall is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the editUser.esp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the role parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Palo Alto Networks firewall (3.0.9 or 3.1.1 or later), available from the Palo Alto Networks Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0483.title: Microsoft Windows MsgBox() code execution
CVE-2010-0483.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the automatic opening of HELP (.hlp) files by the VBScript MsgBox() function in winhlp32.exe. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site and pressing the "F1" key in response to the MsgBox popup box, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0496.title: ServersMan for iPhone and iPod Touch denial of service
CVE-2010-0496.body: ServersMan for iPhone and iPod Touch is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing requests. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP HEAD request to the Web root, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0550.title: Geo++ GNCASTER HTTP basic weak security
CVE-2010-0550.body: Geo++ GNCASTER could provide weaker than expected security. The /admin.htm path is accessible using the HTTP Basic Authentication method when it should only be available via the HTTP Digest Authentication method.Upgrade to the latest version of Geo++ (1.4.0.8 or later), available from the Geo++ Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0551.title: Geo++ GNCASTER server information disclosure
CVE-2010-0551.body: Geo++ GNCASTER could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a memory leak in the server after a failed authentication request. By sending an HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the authentication headers from other users and other sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of Geo++ (1.4.0.8 or later), available from the Geo++ Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0552.title: Geo++ GNCASTER HTTP GET code execution
CVE-2010-0552.body: Geo++ GNCASTER could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when processing HTTP requests. By sending a series of overly long HTTP GET requests, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Geo++ (1.4.0.8 or later), available from the Geo++ Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0553.title: Geo++ GNCASTER NMEA-data code execution
CVE-2010-0553.body: Geo++ GNCASTER could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper handling of NMEA-data. By sending overly long NMEA-data sentences, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Geo++ (1.4.0.8 or later), available from the Geo++ Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0554.title: Geo++ GNCASTER nonce replay
CVE-2010-0554.body: Geo++ GNCASTER could allow a remote attacker to launch a replay attack. The server generates a nonce for HTTP Digest authentication and utilizes the same nonce for all other authentication until it is restarted. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to conduct replay attacks.Upgrade to the latest version of Geo++ (1.4.0.8 or later), available from the Geo++ Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0571.title: Cisco Digital Media Manager privilege escalation
CVE-2010-0571.body: Cisco Digital Media Manager could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify configuration settings and gain complete control of the device.Refer tovcisco-sa-20100303-dmm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0572.title: Cisco Digital Media Manager Digital Media Player information disclosure
CVE-2010-0572.body: Cisco Digital Media Manager could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to restrict access to error log messages and stack traces. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view Cisco Digital Media Player user credentials and LDAP credentials.Refer to cisco-sa-20100303-dmm for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0577.title: Cisco IOS TCP segment denial of service
CVE-2010-0577.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the TCP options processing code when receiving TCP segments during the TCP session establishment phase. If the device has a special configuration, a remote attacker could send a TCP segment containing a specially-crafted TCP option to cause the watchdog timer to time out and cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20100324-tcp for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0578.title: Cisco IOS VPN Acceleration Module denial of service
CVE-2010-0578.body: Cisco IOS devices that are running Cisco IOS software with a VPN Acceleration Module 2+ (VAM2+) installed are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the implementation of IKE. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted Internet Key Exchange (IKE) packet to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20100324-ipsec for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0589.title: Cisco Secure Desktop CSDWebInstaller ActiveX control code execution
CVE-2010-0589.body: The Cisco Secure Desktop could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper verification of an executable file used during the installation process by the CSDWebInstaller ActiveX control. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could download a malicious package to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Refer to cisco-sa-20100414-csd for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0610.title: Photoblog component for Joomla! blog SQL injection
CVE-2010-0610.body: The Photoblog component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the detail.php and index.php scripts using the id or blog parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Photoblog component for Joomla! (alpha 3b or later), available from the Joomla! Extensions Directory Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0611.title: Baal Systems adminlogin.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0611.body: Baal Systems is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the adminlogin.php script using the username or password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0614.body: evalSMSI is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-0617.body: evalSMSI is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ajax.php script. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of evalSMSI (2.2 or later), available from the evalSMSI Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0630.title: Evernew Free Joke Script viewjokes.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0630.body: Evernew Free Joke Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the viewjokes.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0632.title: SimpleFAQ component for Joomla! catid SQL injection
CVE-2010-0632.body: The SimpleFAQ component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0641.title: Cisco Collaboration Server (CCS) LoginPage.jhtml cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0641.body: Cisco Collaboration Server (CCS) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the LoginPage.jhtml script. CVE-2010-0642.title: Cisco Collaboration Server files information disclosure

CVE-2010-0690.body: Video Games Rentals Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-0693.title: Trade Manager Script products.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0693.body: Trade Manager Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the products.php script using cid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0694.title: PerchaGallery component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0694.body: The PerchaGallery component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of PerchaGallery, available from the Percha Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0697.title: iTweak Upload module for Drupal file names cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0697.body: The iTweak Upload module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when displaying uploaded files. A remote attacker with permission to create content and upload files could exploit this vulnerability using file names to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2010-017 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0698.title: WSC CMS login.asp SQL injection
CVE-2010-0698.body: WSC CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the backoffice/login.asp script using the password field, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0700.title: WampServer index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0700.body: WampServer is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the lang parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0701.title: OmniDocs ForceChangePassword.jsp SQL injection
CVE-2010-0701.body: OmniDocs is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the ForceChangePassword.jsp script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.OmniDocs customers should contact OmniDocs support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2010-0702.title: Fonality trixbox PhoneDirectory.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0702.body: Fonality trixbox is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the PhoneDirectory.php script using the ID parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0703.title: PortWise SSL VPN reloadFrame cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0703.body: PortWise SSL VPN is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the wa/auth login page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the reloadFrame parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Customers should upgrade to the latest version of PortWise SSL VPN (4.6.2, 4.7.1, 4.8, 4.9 or later), available from the PortWise Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0706.title: Nikira Fraud Management System message cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0706.body: Nikira Fraud Management System is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the message parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0707.title: Employee Timeclock Software add_user.php cross-site request forgery
CVE-2010-0707.body: Employee Timeclock Software is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the add_user.php script. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to add administrative users. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0709.title: Limny admin cross-site request forgery
CVE-2010-0709.body: Limny is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to create a new administrative user or change passwords and email addresses with the privileges of the user. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Limny (2.01 or later), available from the Limny Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0712.title: Zenoss getJSONEventsInfo SQL injection
CVE-2010-0712.body: Zenoss is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to getJSONEventsInfo using the severity, state, filter, offset, or count parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Zenoss (2.5 or later), available from the Zenoss Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0714.title: Multiple IBM products login page cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0714.body: Multiple IBM products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate update for your system, available from the IBM Support and Downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0716.title: Microsoft Sharepoint Upload.aspx cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0716.body: Microsoft Sharepoint is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Upload.aspx script within the Documents module. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an uploaded TXT file to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of SharePoint Server (2010 or later), available from the Microsoft Office SharePoint Server Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0718.title: Microsoft Windows Media Player .mpg denial of service
CVE-2010-0718.body: Microsoft Windows Media Player is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a divide-by-zero error when processing .mpg audio files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .mpg file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0719.title: Microsoft Windows API denial of service
CVE-2010-0719.body: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure to validate arguments by an unspecified API. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted application to cause the system to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0721.body: Auktionshaus Gelb is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-0722.body: Php Auktion Pro is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-0723.body: Ero Auktion is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-0751.title: libnids ip_fragment.c, denial of service
CVE-2010-0751.body: libnids is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in ip_fragment.c,. By sending specially-crafted network traffic, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the library using the affected library.Upgrade to the latest version of libnids (1.24 or later), available from the linnids Web site. CVE-2010-0752.title: Weekly Archive by Node Type module for Drupal information disclosure
CVE-2010-0752.body: The Weekly Archive by Node Type module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. SQL queries are constructed with improper node access restrictions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specific node type in a SQL query to bypass the node access module restrictions and view sensitive node information.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2010-019 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-0753.title: SQL Reports component for Joomla! print.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-0753.body: The SQL Reports component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the print.php script using the user_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0753.title: SQL Reports component for Joomla! user_id SQL injection
CVE-2010-0753.body: The SQL Reports component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the print.php script using the user_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0754.title: WikyBlog which cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0754.body: WikyBlog is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the which parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2010-0755.body: WikyBlog could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the WBmap.php script using the langfile parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0756.title: WikyBlog multiple session hijacking
CVE-2010-0756.body: WikyBlog could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by improper validation of the jsessionid parameter in index.php/Comment/Main, Index.php/Comment/Main/Home_Wiky and index.php/Edit/Main. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack another user's account and gain the victim's privileges.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0759.title: Core Design Scriptegrator plugin for Joomla! jsloader.php file include
CVE-2010-0759.body: The Core Design Scriptegrator plugin for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the jsloader.php script using the files[] parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.As a workaround for this vulnerability, uninstall the affected component.

CVE-2010-0762.body: CD Rentals Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-0765.body: fipsForum could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the forumFips.mdb file stored inside the Web root. CVE-2010-0768.title: WebSphere Application Server Administration Console cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0768.body: WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Administration Console. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.9 or later) or APAR PK97376. For IBM WebSphere Application Server 6.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.0.2.41 or later) or APAR PK97376. See References.

CVE-2010-0770.body: WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling SSL handshakes for ORB clients. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause WAS ORB threads to hang and prevent new clients from connecting.For IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.9 or later) or APAR PK93653. See References. For IBM WebSphere Application Server 6.1: Apply the latest Fix Pack (6.1.0.31 or later) or APAR PK93653. See References. CVE-2010-0774.body: WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions caused by an error related to the handling of WebServices PKIPath and PKCS#7 tokens types in the JAX-RPC WS-Security 1.0 and JAX-WS runtimes. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security mechanisms.For IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.11 or later) or APAR PK96427. See References. CVE-2010-0775.body: WebSphere Application Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an OutOfMemory condition related to the Deployment Manager and nodeagent. CVE-2010-0780.body: IBM WebSphere MQ is vulnerable to a denial of service when running under certain configurations. CVE-2010-0796.body: The JE Quiz component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-0806.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer use-after-free code execution
CVE-2010-0806.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute code on the system, caused by an unspecified use-after-free error. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access an invalid pointer associated with a deleted object to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0819.title: Microsoft Windows OpenType Compact Font Format privilege escalation
CVE-2010-0819.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper validation of data passed from user mode to kernel mode by the OpenType Compact Font Format (CFF) driver. By using a specially-crafted application, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-0828.title: MoinMoin Despam.py cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0828.body: MoinMoin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by Despam.py. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the page name to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to MoinMoin Web Site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information.
