CVE-2010-0830.title: glibc ELF code execution
CVE-2010-0830.body: glibc could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow error in ld.so. By persuading a victim to process a specially-crafted ELF binary, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-0917.body: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by winhlp32.exe. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .HLP file containing an overly long string in the fourth argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0919.title: Lotus iNotes ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2010-0919.body: The Lotus iNotes (formerly Domino Web Access) ActiveX control is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow when the Lotus iNotes feature is enabled and executed, caused by an error in the dwa8.dll and dwa8w.dll libraries. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the victim's browser to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of IBM iNotes (7.0.4 or 8.5 or later), available from the IBM Support and Downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0921.title: Lotus iNotes Get Filter and Referer cross-site request forgery
CVE-2010-0921.body: Lotus iNotes (formerly Domino Web Access) is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by an error related to "Get Filter" and "Referer Check". By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to hijack the authentication of unspecified victims. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of IBM iNotes (7.0.4 or 8.5 or later), available from the IBM Support and Downloads Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0928.title: OpenSSL Fixed Width Exponentiation (FWE) weak security
CVE-2010-0928.body: OpenSSL could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the use of a Fixed Width Exponentiation (FWE) algorithm for signature calculations when running on the Gaisler Research LEON3 SoC on the Xilinx Virtex-II Pro FPGA which does not verify the signature before providing it to a caller. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to discover the private key using a modified supply voltage for the microprocessor.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenSSL (0.9.8i or later), available from the OpenSSL Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-0938.title: Todoo Forum todooforum.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0938.body: Todoo Forum is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the todooforum.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id_forum parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-0940.title: Simple PHP Guestbook guestbook.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-0940.body: Simple PHP Guestbook is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the guestbook.php script. CVE-2010-1107.title: Recent Comments module for Drupal title cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1107.body: The Recent Comments module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the custom block title interface. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2010-008 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1108.title: Control Panel module for Drupal unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1108.body: The Control Panel module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker with Administer Blocks permission could exploit this vulnerability to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2010-007 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1109.title: phpMySport index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-1109.body: phpMySport is vulnerable to SQL injection. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1110.title: phpMySport file manager directory traversal
CVE-2010-1110.body: phpMySport could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted request to the File Manager containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view the directory structure and arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1111.title: EasySiteNetwork Jokes Complete Website multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1111.body: EasySiteNetwork Jokes Complete Website is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the joke.php or results.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the id or searchingred parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1113.title: Web Server Creator index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1113.body: Web Server Creator is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "pg" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1114.title: Web Server Creator index.php file include
CVE-2010-1114.body: Web Server Creator could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php and form.php scripts using the "pg" or path parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1115.title: Web Server Creator customize.php directory traversal
CVE-2010-1115.body: Web Server Creator could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the customize.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the "l" parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1116.title: LookMer Music Portal LookMerSarkiMDB.mdb information disclosure
CVE-2010-1116.body: LookMer Music Portal could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper restrictions on the LookMerSarkiMDB.mdb file. By sending a direct request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to download the database file and obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1117.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer base address buffer overflow
CVE-2010-1117.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By using unknown attack vectors, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer to discover the base address of a Windows .dll file or have other unknown impact on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1132.title: SpamAssassin Milter Plugin expand (-x) flag command execution
CVE-2010-1132.body: The SpamAssassin Milter Plugin could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by the mlfi_envrcpt function prior to being used in a popen() function call. If invoked with the expand (-x) flag, a remote attacker could send a specially crafted RCPT TO value to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-1133.title: TikiWiki CMS/Groupware unknown input SQL injection
CVE-2010-1133.body: TikiWiki CMS/Groupware is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the searchlib.php script using the searchDate variable, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of TikiWiki (3.5 or 4.2 or later), available from the TikiWiki CMS/Groupware Website. See References.

CVE-2010-1134.title: TikiWiki CMS/Groupware unknown input SQL injection
CVE-2010-1134.body: TikiWiki CMS/Groupware is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the searchlib.php script using the searchDate variable, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of TikiWiki (3.5 or 4.2 or later), available from the TikiWiki CMS/Groupware Website. See References.

CVE-2010-1136.title: TikiWiki CMS/Groupware Standard Remember method unspecified
CVE-2010-1136.body: An unspecified error in TikiWiki CMS/Groupware related to Standard Remember method for persistent login has an unknown impact.Upgrade to the latest version of TikiWiki (3.5 or 4.2 or later), available from the TikiWiki CMS/Groupware Website. See References.

CVE-2010-1155.title: Irssi hostname man-in-the-middle
CVE-2010-1155.body: Irssi is vulnerable to a man-in-the-middle attack, caused by the failure to check the hostname when establishing SSL connections. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to perform a man-in-the-middle attack.Upgrade to the latest version of Irssi (0.8.15 or later), available from the Irssi Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-1163.title: sudo sudoedit privilege escalation
CVE-2010-1163.body: sudo could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error when performing command matching against the sudoedit command. If the PATH environment variable includes "." and does not include other directories containing a sudoedit command, the ignore_dot or secure_path sudoers options are disabled.a local attacker with sudoedit privileges could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of sudo (1.6.9p22 and 1.7.2p6 or later), available from the sudo Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-1164.title: Atlassian JIRA element cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1164.body: Atlassian JIRA is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the element or other various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to JRA-20994 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1164.title: Atlassian JIRA groupnames cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1164.body: Atlassian JIRA is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the groupnames.jsp, indexbrowser.jsp, classpath-debug.jsp, viewdocument.jsp, and cleancommentspam.jsp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to JRA-20994 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1165.title: Atlassian JIRA path settings privilege escalation
CVE-2010-1165.body: Atlassian JIRA could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the ability of administrators to modify path settings. A remote attacker with administrative privileges could exploit this vulnerability to gain operating system account privileges.Refer to JRA-20995 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1169.title: PostgreSQL Safe.pm code execution
CVE-2010-1169.body: PostgreSQL could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error in Safe.pm and PL/Perl. If PL/Perl is installed and enabled, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary Perl code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of PostgreSQL (8.4.4, 8.3.11, 8.2.17, 8.1.21, 8.0.25, or 7.4.29 or later), available from the PostgreSQL Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-1171.title: Red Hat Network Satellite Server XML-RPC API information disclosure
CVE-2010-1171.body: Red Hat Network Satellite Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper exposing of an obsolete XML-RPC API for package group configuration. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to arbitrary files accessible to the RHN Satellite server process.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-1172.title: D-Bus GLib Bindings property security bypass
CVE-2010-1172.body: D-Bus GLib Bindings could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to respect the access flag on property specifications. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify exported properties.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-1174.title: Cisco TFTP Server denial of service
CVE-2010-1174.body: Cisco TFTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing TFTP packets. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash the server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1180.title: Apple Safari running on iPhone and iPod touch throw code execution
CVE-2010-1180.body: Apple Safari running on iPhone and iPod touch could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the throw exception handler. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a throw statement with an overly long exception value to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1184.title: Microsoft wireless keyboard XOR weak security
CVE-2010-1184.body: The Microsoft wireless keyboard could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the use of XOR encryption derived from the MAC address. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a local wireless device to possibly inject arbitrary commands on the system or view a victim's keystrokes.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1185.title: SAP MaxDB serv.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2010-1185.body: SAP MaxDB is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the serv.exe process. By sending specially-crafted handshake packets to TCP port 7210, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM privileges or cause the application to crash.Current SAP customers should refer to SAP Note 1409425 for patch information, available from the SAP Web site (login required). See References.

CVE-2010-1186.title: NextGEN Gallery plugin for WordPress mode cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1186.body: The NextGEN Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the media-rss.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the mode parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of NextGEN Gallery (1.5.2 or later), available from the NextGEN Gallery Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-1196.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey nsGenericDOMDataNode::SetTextInternal() buffer overflow
CVE-2010-1196.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by an integer overflow in the nsGenericDOMDataNode::SetTextInternal() function. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using overly large strings to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to MFSA 2010-29 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1197.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey Content-Disposition HTTP header security bypass
CVE-2010-1197.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. When Content-Type: multipart headers are present, the Content-Disposition HTTP header is ignored. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions to possibly conduct cross-site scripting attacks on certain Web pages.Refer to MFSA 2010-32 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1198.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey plugin instances code execution
CVE-2010-1198.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error when multiple plugin instances share references. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system or cause a denial of service.Refer to MFSA 2010-28 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1199.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey XSLT node sorting code execution
CVE-2010-1199.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the XSLT node sorting routine. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a node containing an overly large text value to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to MFSA 2010-30 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1218.title: mm_forum extension for TYPO3 unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1218.body: The mm_forum extension for TYPO3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to TYPO3-SA-2010-007 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1219.title: JA News component for Joomla! index.php file include
CVE-2010-1219.body: The JA News component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the controller parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1224.title: Asterisk CIDR security bypass
CVE-2010-1224.body: Asterisk could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error related to unpredictable behavior when the "permit=" and "deny=" host access rules are used in conjunction with CIDR notation "/0". An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass access controls to gain unauthorized access to restricted hosts.Refer to AST-2010-003 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1241.title: Adobe Reader custom heap management system code execution
CVE-2010-1241.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader related to a weakness in the custom heap management system could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system via a specially-crafted .pdf file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1244.title: Apache ActiveMQ Web console cross-site request forgery
CVE-2010-1244.body: Apache ActiveMQ is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the web console application. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to perform unauthorized actions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of ActiveMQ (5.3.1 or later), available from the Apache Software Foundation Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-1256.title: Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) authentication code execution
CVE-2010-1256.body: Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by incorrect memory allocation when parsing specific authentication information passed by the client. If the Extended Protection for Authentication feature is disabled on the client but enabled on the server, a remote authenticated attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system with Network Service account privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS10-040. See References.

CVE-2010-1266.title: WebMaid CMS index.php file include
CVE-2010-1266.body: WebMaid CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php, top.php and footer.php scripts using multiple parameters to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1268.title: justVisual CMS index.php file include
CVE-2010-1268.body: justVisual CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the "p" parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1269.title: phpscripte24 Niedrig Gebote Pro Auktions System II auktion.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-1269.body: phpscripte24 Niedrig Gebote Pro Auktions System II is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the auktion.php script using the id_auk parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1270.title: Auktionshaus auktion.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-1270.body: Auktionshaus is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the auktion.php script using the id_auk parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1272.title: Gnat-TGP tgpinc.php file include
CVE-2010-1272.body: Gnat-TGP could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the tgpinc.php script using the DOCUMENT_ROOT parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1274.body: Wt is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version (3.1.1 or later), available from the Wt Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-1296.title: Adobe Photoshop CS4 multiple code execution
CVE-2010-1296.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Photoshop CS4 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system by persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted ASL, .ABR, or .GRD file.Refer to APSB10-13 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1299.title: DynPG CMS guestbookaction.php file include
CVE-2010-1299.body: DynPG CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the guestbookaction.php script using the PathToRoot parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of DynPG CMS (4.1.1 or later), available from the DynPG Web site. CVE-2010-1300.title: Yamamah index.php calbums parameter SQL Injection
CVE-2010-1300.body: Yamamah is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-1300.body: Yamamah is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the calbums parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1301.body: Centreon is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-1303.title: Taxonomy Filter module for Drupal names cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1303.body: The Taxonomy Filter module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2010-1304.body: The User Status component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. Extensions Directory Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-1305.body: The JInventory component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2010-1307.body: The Magic Updater component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1315.title: webERPcustomer component for Joomla! file include
CVE-2010-1315.body: The webERPcustomer component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2010-1325.title: Apache SLMS Quoting cross-site request forgery
CVE-2010-1325.body: Apache SLMS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by the improper quoting of parameters. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-1327.title: TornadoStore precios.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-1327.body: TornadoStore is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the precios.php and abm_list.php script using the marca or where parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of TornadoStore, available from the TornadoStore Web site. CVE-2010-1328.title: TornadoStore multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1328.body: TornadoStore is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of TornadoStore, available from the TornadoStore Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-1330.title: JRuby expression engine cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1330.body: JRuby is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by the improper handling of characters immediately after a UTF-8 character by the regular expression engine. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted string to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of JRuby (1.4.1 or later), available from the JRuby Web site. CVE-2010-1332.title: PrettyFormMail unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1332.body: PrettyFormMail is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. CVE-2010-1335.title: Insky CMS ROOT parameter file include
CVE-2010-1335.body: Insky CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2010-1336.body: INVOhost is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-1336.body: INVOhost is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to index.php script using the view parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote or the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code using a local file, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1984.title: Taxonomy Breadcrumb module for Drupal name cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-1984.body: The Taxonomy Breadcrumb module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker with administer taxonomy permissions could exploit this vulnerability using taxonomy term name and node title to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2010-032 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-1986.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript code denial of service
CVE-2010-1986.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using JavaScript code that creates arrays containing elements with overly long strings and appends the strings to P element content to consume all available memory resources.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1987.title: Mozilla Firefox P element denial of service
CVE-2010-1987.body: Mozilla Firefox is vulnerable to a denial of service. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using JavaScript code that appends overly long strings to P element content to consume all available memory resources.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-1996.title: TomatoCMS index.php keyword parameter cross site scripting
CVE-2010-1996.body: TomatoCMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php/admin/poll/add script. A remote attacker with Create new tag permissions could exploit this vulnerability using keyword field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of TomatoCMS (2.0.5 or later), available from the TomatoCMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-1996.title: TomatoCMS index.php meta parameter cross site scripting
CVE-2010-1996.body: TomatoCMS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php/admin/poll/add script. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of TomatoCMS (2.0.5 or later), available from the TomatoCMS Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-1998.body: The CCK TableField module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when attaching data to a node. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2010-039 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2010-2003.title: Advanced Poll get_admin.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2003.body: Advanced Poll is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the get_admin.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the mysql_host parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2005.title: DataLife Engine multiple scripts file include
CVE-2010-2005.body: DataLife Engine could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the init.php, help.php, pm.php or addcomments.php script using the selected_language, config[langs], config[lang_] or the _REQUEST[skin] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2006.title: LetoDMS op.login.php file include
CVE-2010-2006.body: LetoDMS (formerly MyDMS) could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the op.Login.php script using the lang parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of LetoDMS (1.9.0 or later), available from the SourceForge.net Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2007.title: LetoDMS multiple cross-site request forgery
CVE-2010-2007.body: LetoDMS (formerly MyDMS) is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the op.EditUserData.php, op.UsrMgr.php, out.RemoveVersion.php, op.RemoveFolder.php, op.DefaultKeywords.php, op.GroupMgr.php, op.FolderAccess.php, op.FolderNotify.php and the op.MoveFolder.php scripts. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could use specially-crafted POST requests to perform arbitrary tasks with the permissions of the user. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2058.title: Prewikka setup.py information disclosure
CVE-2010-2058.body: Prewikka could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the installation of prewikka.conf with world-readable permission by setup.py. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the SQL database password and other sensitive information.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2063.title: Samba SMB1 packet code execution
CVE-2010-2063.body: Samba could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error. By sending a specially-crafted SMB1 packet, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.Upgrade to the latest version of Samba (3.3.13 or later), available from the Samba Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2068.title: Apache mod_proxy_http timeout information disclosure
CVE-2010-2068.body: Apache could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in mod_proxy_http when handling timeouts. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain information via server responses.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache httpd (2.2.16-dev or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2072.title: pyftpd log file symlink
CVE-2010-2072.body: pyftpd could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack. Log files are created to insecure temporary files. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file to various files on the system, which could allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of pyftpd (0.8.5 or later), available from the Debian Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2078.title: DataTrack Systems unicode information disclosure
CVE-2010-2078.body: DataTrack could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a direct URL request containing a NO-BREAK SPACE "\u00a0" or NEXT LINE (NEL) "\u00A0" Unicode character to disclose the contents of the root directory.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2080.title: OTRS unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2080.body: OTRS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by an unspecified script. CVE-2010-2090.body: IBM Communications Server for AIX is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when handling APPC packets. By sending specially-crafted APPC data with an incorrect length in the GDSID, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the communication server to crash.Refer to IBM APAR IZ68810 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.
