CVE-2010-2188.title: Adobe Flash Player and Air memory code execution
CVE-2010-2188.body: Adobe Flash Player and Air could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the exposed connect method. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could call the method multiple times using ActionScript native object number 2200 to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB10-14 or APSB10-16 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2189.title: Adobe Flash Player and Air VMWare code execution
CVE-2010-2189.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player and Air, when running on VMWare systems with VMWare Tools enabled, could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB10-14 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2190.title: PHP substr_replace information disclosure
CVE-2010-2190.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the trim, ltrim, rtrim, and substr_replace functions. An attacker could exploit this by causing a userspace interruption of an internal function, related to the call time pass by reference feature to obtain memory contents.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2191.title: PHP parse_str information disclosure
CVE-2010-2191.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the parse_str, preg_match, unpack, pack functions, the ZEND_FETCH_RW, ZEND_CONCAT, and ZEND_ASSIGN_CONCAT opcodes and the ArrayObject::uasort method . An attacker could exploit this by causing a userspace interruption of an internal function, related to the call time pass by reference feature to obtain memory contents.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2193.title: CA PSFormX and WebScan ActiveX controls code execution
CVE-2010-2193.body: The CA PSFormX and WebScan ActiveX controls could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on a system. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site that passes specially-crafted arguments to an insecure method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Refer to CA20100608-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2197.title: RPM rpmbuild weak security
CVE-2010-2197.body: RPM could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the improper parsing of the syntax of spec files. By persuading a victim to remove home directories using unknown attack vectors involving a ;~ (semicolon tilde) sequence in a Name tag, a remote attacker could launch further attacks on the system.Apply the appropriate updates for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2199.title: RPM fsm.c security bypass
CVE-2010-2199.body: RPM could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper resetting of the metadata within an executable file during file replacement in an RPM package upgrade or file deletion in an RPM package removal by fsm.c. By creating a hard link to a file with a POSIX ACL, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions.Apply the appropriate updates for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2225.title: PHP SplObjectStorage class unserialize() code execution
CVE-2010-2225.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in the SplObjectStorage class unserialize() function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Revision 300843), available from the PHP SVN repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2313.title: Anodyne SIMM SMS index.php file include
CVE-2010-2313.body: Anodyne SIMM SMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the page parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2315.title: Phpbazar picturelib.php file include
CVE-2010-2315.body: Phpbazar could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the picturelib.php script using the cat parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2320.title: bozohttpd public_html information disclosure
CVE-2010-2320.body: bozotic HTTP server (aka bozohttpd) could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of multiple requests to a user's public_html folder. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to display the user's home directories and obtain user accounts.Upgrade to the latest version of bozohttp (20100621 or later), available from the Bozotic Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2321.title: Adobe InDesign INDD buffer ovefflow
CVE-2010-2321.body: Adobe InDesign is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing INDD files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted INDD file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Adobe has dropped support for InDesign CS3 and recommends upgrading to CS4 or later.

CVE-2010-2330.title: File Sharing Wizard Content-Length header buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2330.body: File Sharing Wizard is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by when handling malformed requests. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP GET request containing an overly long Content-Length header, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2332.title: Impact PDF Reader iPhone and iPod Touch denial of service
CVE-2010-2332.body: The Impact PDF Reader for iPhone and iPod touch is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of requests. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the affected application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2337.title: RSA Federated Identity Manager redirection weak security
CVE-2010-2337.body: RSA Federated Identity Manager could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the redirection of users. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unknown attack vector to construct a malicious URL which would redirect a victim to an arbitrary Web site, once the site is visited, and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Hot fix 4.0.25 or Hot fix 4.1.26), available from the RSA Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2338.title: VU Web Visitor Analyst login page SQL injection
CVE-2010-2338.body: VU Web Visitor Analyst is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the admin login page using the Username or Password parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2339.title: Subdreamer CMS pages.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2339.body: Subdreamer CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the pages.php script using the categoryids[] POST parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2341.title: EZPX Photoblog commentform.php file include
CVE-2010-2341.body: EZPX Photoblog could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the commentform.php script using the tpl_base_dir parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2345.title: odCMS password cross-site request forgery
CVE-2010-2345.body: odCMS is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted HTTP request to modify the administrator's password. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2347.title: SAP J2EE Engine Core telnet interface weak security
CVE-2010-2347.body: SAP J2EE Engine Core could provide weaker than expected security, caused by an unspecified error in the telnet interface. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to replay authentication credentials and possibly launch further attacks against the system.Refer to SAP Note 1425847 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2348.title: Batch Audio Converter .WAV file buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2348.body: Batch Audio Converter is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing a .WAV file. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .WAV file containing an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2350.title: Ziproxy PNG buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2350.body: Ziproxy is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking in image.c. By persuading a victim to view a specially crafted PNG file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Ziproxy (3.1.1 or later), available from the Ziproxy Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2351.title: Novell Netware CIFS.NLM buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2351.body: Novell Netware is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by in CIFS.NLM. By sending a specially-crafted Session Setup AndX SMB packet containing an overly long AccountName, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel privileges or cause the server to crash.Refer to Novell Document ID: 5076512 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2352.title: Content Construction Kit (CCK) module for Drupal Node Reference information disclosure
CVE-2010-2352.body: The Content Construction Kit (CCK) module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to gain sensitive information, caused by improper validation by the Node Reference module. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view restricted nodes, node titles, and IDs.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2010-065 or SA-CONTRIB-2010-088 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2353.title: Content Construction Kit (CCK) module for Drupal Node Reference information disclosure
CVE-2010-2353.body: The Content Construction Kit (CCK) module for Drupal could allow a remote attacker to gain sensitive information, caused by improper validation by the Node Reference module. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view restricted nodes, node titles, and IDs.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2010-065 or SA-CONTRIB-2010-088 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2354.title: eLMS Pro subscribe.php SQL Injection
CVE-2010-2354.body: eLMS Pro is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the subscribe.php script using the course_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2356.title: eLMS Pro subscribe.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2356.body: eLMS Pro is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the subscribe.php and error.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the course_id or message parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2357.title: Erica PHP Real Estate index.php SQL Injection
CVE-2010-2357.body: Erica PHP Real Estate is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the p_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2358.title: Nakid CMS upload_photo.php file include
CVE-2010-2358.body: Nakid CMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled and register_globals is enabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the upload_photo.php script using the core[system_path] parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2359.title: eWebquiz Quiztype SQL injection
CVE-2010-2359.body: eWebquiz is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the eWebQuiz.asp script using the Quiztype parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2360.title: Winny unspecified buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2360.body: Winny is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By using unknown attack vectors, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2360.title: Winny unspecified buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2360.body: Winny is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By using unknown attack vectors, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2361.title: Winny BBS denial of service
CVE-2010-2361.body: Winny is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing BBS information. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2362.title: Winny node information denial of service
CVE-2010-2362.body: Winny is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing node information. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2363.title: SEIL routers IPv6 spoofing
CVE-2010-2363.body: SEIL routers could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper filtering when IPv6 Unicast Reverse Path Forwarding (RPF) is enabled. If IPv6 Unicast RPF to be configured in strict mode, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a spoofed IP address to gain unauthorized access to the device.Upgrade to the latest version of SEIL (2.74 or later), available from the SEIL Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2427.title: VMware Studio temporary files privilege escalation
CVE-2010-2427.body: VMware Studio could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error when handling temporary files. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system.Refer to VMSA-2010-0011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2428.title: Wing FTP Server admini_loginok.html cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2428.body: Wing FTP Server is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the admini_loginok.html page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2429.title: Splunk Referer header cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2429.body: Splunk is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when returning 404 Not Found response when using Internet Explorer. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Referrer header in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Splunk (4.1.3 or later), available from the Splunk Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2433.title: IBM WebSphere ILOG JRules multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2433.body: IBM WebSphere ILOG JRules is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the explore.jsp, compose.jsp, and home.jsp scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to IBM APAR RS00133 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2438.title: G. CMS generator unspecifed SQL injection
CVE-2010-2438.body: G. CMS generator is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to an unspecified script using the lang parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2439.title: MoreAmp .maf file buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2439.body: MoreAmp is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .maf file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of MoreAmp (0.1.26 or later), available from the MoreAmp Web page. See References.

CVE-2010-2454.title: Apple Safari HTMl spoofing
CVE-2010-2454.body: Apple Safari could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper management of the address bar when requesting to open a URL and the content of a new document. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted HTML document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed in the address bar.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2455.title: Opera HTML spoofing
CVE-2010-2455.body: Opera could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by the improper management of the address bar when requesting to open a URL and the content of a new document. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted HTML document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed in the address bar.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2456.title: Linker IMG index.php file include
CVE-2010-2456.body: Linker could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the lan_dir or Sdb_type parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2458.title: 2daybiz Video Community Portal video.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2458.body: 2daybiz Video Community Portal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the video.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the videoid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2459.title: 2daybiz Video Community Portal video.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2459.body: 2daybiz Video Community Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the video.php and user-profile.php scripts using the videoid or userid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2460.title: Shareasale Script merchant_product_list.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2460.body: Shareasale Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the merchant_product_list.php script using the mechant_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2461.title: Overstock storecat.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2461.body: Overstock is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the storecat.php script using the store parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2464.title: RSComments component for Joomla! index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2464.body: RSComments component for Joomla! is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the website or name parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of RSComments (Rev 3 or later), available from the RSComments Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2489.title: Ruby ARGF.inplace_mode buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2489.body: Ruby is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling filenames on Windows systems. By assigning a malicious value to the ARGF.inplace_mode variable, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Ruby (1.9.2 -rc1, 1.9.1 -p429 or later), available from the Ruby Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2506.title: Linksys WAP54Gv3 debug.cgi cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2506.body: Linksys WAP54Gv3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the debug.cgi page. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the data1 parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2507.title: Picasa2gallery component for Joomla! index.php file include
CVE-2010-2507.body: Picasa2gallery component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the controller parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2518.title: IBM FileNet Content Search Engine security bypass
CVE-2010-2518.body: An unspecified error in IBM FileNet could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges to configure Content Search Engine and perform other unauthorized actions.Refer to the IBM Support and Downloads for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2526.title: LVM2 socket priviliege escalation
CVE-2010-2526.body: LVM2 could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the use of an abstract socket for communication between lvm and clvmd. If clvmd is running, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to direct clvmd to perform elevated operations.Upgrade to the latest version of LVM2 (2.02.72 or later), available from the LVM2 Web page. See References.

CVE-2010-2528.title: Pidgin X-Status denial of service
CVE-2010-2528.body: Pidgin is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the oscar protocol plugin when processing X-Status messages. By sending a specially-crafted X-Status message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to Pidgin Security Advisory 2010-07-21 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2539.title: MapServer msTmpFile() buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2539.body: MapServer is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the msTmpFile() function. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of MapServer (4.10.6 or 5.6.4 or later), available from the MapServer Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2540.title: MapServer CGI code execution
CVE-2010-2540.body: MapServer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unspecified error when running certain CGI applications with command line debug arguments. A remote attacker could exploit this argument to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of MapServer (4.10.6 or 5.6.4 or later), available from the MapServer Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2544.title: Cacti utilities.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2544.body: Cacti is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the utilities.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the filter parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Cacti (0.8.7g or later), available from the Cacti Web site. Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2545.title: Cacti templates_import.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2545.body: Cacti is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the templates_import.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various object names or descriptions to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Cacti (0.8.7g or later), available from the Cacti Web site. Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2549.title: Microsoft Windows NtUserCheckAccessForIntegrityLevel() privilege escalation
CVE-2010-2549.body: Microsoft Windows could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges, caused by a use-after-free error when a call to the LockProcessByClientId() kernel function using the NtUserCheckAccessForIntegrityLevel() fails. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with kernel privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2010-2575.title: KDE Okular PDB image.cpp buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2575.body: KDE Okular PDB is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking within the RLE decompression in the TranscribePalmImageToJPEG() function. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDB file, an attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (KDE SC 4.3, branch: r1167825, KDE SC 4.4 branch: r1167826, or KDE SC 4.5 branch: r116782), available from the KDE Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2588.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Director code execution
CVE-2010-2588.body: Adobe Shockwave Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the Director (dirapi.dll) module when processing malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Director file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB11-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2589.title: Adobe Shockwave Player Director code execution
CVE-2010-2589.body: Adobe Shockwave Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in the Director (dirapi.dll) module when processing malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted Director file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB11-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2602.title: BlackBerry Enterprise Server BlackBerry Attachment Service buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2602.body: BlackBerry Enterprise Server (BES) and BlackBerry Professional Software are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the BlackBerry Attachment Service component. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file on a BlackBerry smartphone that is associated with a user account on a vulnerable BlackBerry Enterprise Server, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Blackberry KB24761 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2609.title: 2daybiz Job Search Engine keyword parameter SQL injection
CVE-2010-2609.body: 2daybiz Job Search Engine is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the show_search_result.php script using the keyword parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2610.title: 2daybiz Job Site Script multiple SQL injection
CVE-2010-2610.body: 2daybiz Job Site Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the view_current_job.php, show_search_more.php, and show_search_result.php scripts using the jid, job_iid, or left_cat parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2616.title: PHP Bible Search bible.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2616.body: PHP Bible Search is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the bible.php script using the chapter parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2617.title: PHP Bible Search bible.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2617.body: PHP Bible Search is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the bible.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the chapter parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2618.title: AdaptCMS init.php file include
CVE-2010-2618.body: AdaptCMS could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the init.php script using the sitepath parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2622.title: Joomanager component for Joomla! catid parameter SQL injection
CVE-2010-2622.body: Joomanager component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the catid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2623.title: Internet DM Specialist Bed and Breakfast pages.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2623.body: Internet DM Specialist Bed and Breakfast is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the pages.php script using the pp_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2624.title: EasySnaps multiple SQL injection
CVE-2010-2624.body: EasySnaps is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the add_comments.php, greetings.php, and tags_details.php script using multiple parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2626.title: Miyabi CGI Tools SEO Links index.php command execution
CVE-2010-2626.body: Miyabi CGI Tools SEO Links could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of input by the index.pl script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "fn" parameter to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2636.title: WebSphere Commerce sample store pages cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2636.body: WebSphere Commerce is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the sample store pages. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.For WebSphere Commerce 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.1 or later) or APAR JR35424. See References.

CVE-2010-2638.title: IBM WebSphere MQ FDC denial of service
CVE-2010-2638.body: WebSphere MQ is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a loop which can occur when processing an FDC with probe RM680004. By forcing the creation of the FDC with probe RM680004, a local or remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the consumption of all disk resources resulting in a denial of service.For WebSphere MQ 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.1.5 or later) or APAR IC71123. See References.

CVE-2010-2639.title: WebSphere Commerce RunTimeProfileCacheCmdImpl class information disclosure
CVE-2010-2639.body: WebSphere Commerce could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when the outbound messaging system accesses the RunTimeProfileCacheCmdImpl class. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability under certain conditions to cause messages to be send to the wrong recipient.For WebSphere Commerce 7.0: Apply the latest Fix Pack (7.0.0.2 or later) or APAR JR38114. See References.

CVE-2010-2677.title: Open Web Analytics mw_plugin.php file include
CVE-2010-2677.body: Open Web Analytics could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the my_plugin.php script using the IP parameter to specify a malicious file from a remote system, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server.Upgrade to the latest version of Open Web Analytics (1.2.4 or later), available from the Open Web Analytics Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2680.title: JE Section/Property Finder component for Joomla! file include
CVE-2010-2680.body: JE Section/Property Finder component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request using the view parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2682.title: com_realtyna component for Joomla! controller parameter file include
CVE-2010-2682.body: The com_realtyna component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the controller parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2684.title: PageDirector CMS index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2684.body: PageDirector CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.PageDirector CMS customers should contact PageDirector CMS support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2010-2687.title: Site2Nite Boat Classifieds detail.asp SQL injection
CVE-2010-2687.body: Site2Nite Boat Classifieds is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the detail.asp script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2688.title: Site2Nite Boat Classifieds detail.asp SQL injection
CVE-2010-2688.body: Site2Nite Boat Classifieds is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the detail.asp script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2691.title: 2daybiz Custom T-Shirt Design Script multiple SQL injection
CVE-2010-2691.body: 2daybiz Custom T-Shirt Design Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the products_details.php, designview.php, and products.php script using the sbid, designid, or pid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2692.title: 2daybiz Custom T-Shirt Design Script comment cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2692.body: 2daybiz Custom T-Shirt Design Script is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the comments facility on the 2daybiz Web site in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2695.title: Xlight FTP Server SFTP directory traversal
CVE-2010-2695.body: Xlight FTP Server could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted GET request to the SFTP/SSH2 virtual server containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to read arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Xlight FTP Server (3.6.0 or later), available from the Xlight FTP Server Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2696.title: Sijio parent SQL injection
CVE-2010-2696.body: Sijio is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the parent parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2697.title: Sijio title cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2697.body: Sijio is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input when editing a blog and adding or editing an album. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the title POST parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2702.title: Unreal Engine UGameEngine::UpdateConnectingMessage() buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2702.body: Unreal Engine is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the UGameEngine::UpdateConnectingMessage() function. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious server, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2709.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager OvJavaLocale buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2709.body: HP OpenView Network Node Manager is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the webappmon.exe CGI application. By sending a cookie header containing a specially-crafted OvJavaLocale value, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to HPSBMA02563 SSRT100165 rev.1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2714.title: TCW PHP Album index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2714.body: TCW PHP Album is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the album parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2715.title: TCW PHP Album index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2715.body: TCW PHP Album is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the album field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2719.title: phpaaCMS show.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2719.body: phpaaCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the show.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2720.title: phpaaCMS list.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2720.body: phpaaCMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the list.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2721.title: RightInPoint Lyrics V3 Engine index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2721.body: RightInPoint Lyrics V3 Engine is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the artist_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2724.title: Hierarchical Select module for Drupal unspecifed cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2724.body: Hierarchical Select module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of unspecified user-supplied input. A remote attacker with administer taxonomy permissions could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Drupal Hierarchical Select (5.x-3.2 or later or 6.x-3.2 or later), available from the Drupal Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2760.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey nsTreeSelection code execution
CVE-2010-2760.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a dangling pointer vulnerability in nsTreeSelection. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.Refer to MFSA 2010-54 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2762.title: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird SJOW code execution
CVE-2010-2762.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the creation of scope chains ending in outer objects by the XPCSafeJSObjectWrapper (SJOW) security wrapper. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary JavaScript code on the system with chrome privileges.Refer to MFSA 2010-59 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2763.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey SJOW security bypass
CVE-2010-2763.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions and perform cross-site scripting attacks, caused by a logic error within the XPCSafeJSObjectWrapper (SJOW) security wrapper. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions and execute JavaScript in the context of another site. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Refer to MFSA 2010-60 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2764.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey XMLHttpRequest information disclosure
CVE-2010-2764.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. The requestor has read access to the statusText property of an XMLHttpRequest object even when the request is being made across origins. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from within internal networks.Refer to MFSA 2010-63 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2767.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey dangling pointer code execution
CVE-2010-2767.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a dangling pointer vulnerability in the implementation of navigator.plugins in which the navigator object could retain a pointer to the plugins array even after it had been destroyed. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.Refer to MFSA 2010-51 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2770.title: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey font code execution
CVE-2010-2770.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a error when handling fonts on Mac. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.Refer to MFSA 2010-58 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2786.title: Piwik data renderer file include
CVE-2010-2786.body: Piwik could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request for data renderer using an unspecified parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Piwik (0.6.4 or later), available from the Piwik Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2790.title: Zabbix class.curl.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2790.body: Zabbix is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the class.curl.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the formatQuery() function of the Curl class to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Zabbix (1.8.3-rc1 or later), available from the Zabbix Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2791.title: Apache mod_proxy_http information disclosure
CVE-2010-2791.body: Apache could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in mod_proxy_http when handling timeouts. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain information via server responses intended for another user.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache (2.2.10 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2795.title: phpCAS tickets session hijacking
CVE-2010-2795.body: phpCAS could allow a remote attacker to hijack a valid user's session, caused by the improper validation of service tickets prior to assigning the new session. By guessing the valid service ticket, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack another user's account and gain the victim's privileges.Refer to PHPCAS-61 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2796.title: phpCAS callback URL cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2796.body: phpCAS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of the callback URL. If the CAS proxy mode is used, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to PHPCAS-67 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2801.title: cabextract archive code execution
CVE-2010-2801.body: Cabextract could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system caused by an error in cabextract package when processing malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .cab file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of cabextract (1.3 or later), available from the cabextract Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2809.title: uzbl @SELECTED_URI command execution
CVE-2010-2809.body: uzbl could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by insecure settings within uzbl-core.c. By persuading a victim to click on a specially-crafted @SELECTED_URI using the middle mouse button, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands on the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2810.title: Lynx convert_to_idna() buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2810.body: Lynx is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the convert_to_idna() function. By persuading a victim to follow a specially-crafted link containing the "%" character, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2813.title: SquirrelMail IMAP denial of servcie
CVE-2010-2813.body: SquirrelMail is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of IMAP login attempts with 8-bit characters within the password. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using random login attempts to cause the system to consume an overly large amount of disk space.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2844.title: Newsoffice news_show.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2844.body: Newsoffice is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the news_show.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the n-cat parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2845.title: QuickFAQ component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2845.body: QuickFAQ component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the Itemid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2846.title: ArtForms component for Joomla! index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2846.body: The ArtForms component for Joomla! is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the afmsg parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2847.title: ArtForms component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2847.body: The ArtForms component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the viewform or id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2848.body: The ArtForms component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the playcode.php script containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) in the "l" parameter to download and view arbitrary files on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2849.title: Nubuilder nuedit.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2849.body: Nubuilder is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the nuedit.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the "f" parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of nuBuilder (10.7.12 or later), available from the nuBuilder Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2850.title: Nubuilder fileuploader.php file include
CVE-2010-2850.body: Nubuilder could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the fileuploader.php script using the dir parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of nuBuilder (10.7.12 or later), available from the nuBuilder Web site. CVE-2010-2851.title: Booklibrary component for Joomla! id parameter SQL injection
CVE-2010-2851.body: Booklibrary component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Booklibrary (1.5_2010_06_25 or later), available from the Ordasoft Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2852.title: RunCms magpie_debug.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2852.body: RunCms is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the magpie_debug.php script. If the Headlines module is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the url parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2853.title: iScripts VisualCaster playVideo.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2853.body: iScripts VisualCaster is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the playVideo.php script using the product_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Patch1.0), available from the Patch1.0 Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2857.title: Music Manager component for Joomla! album.html file include
CVE-2010-2857.body: Music Manager component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the album.html page using the cid parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. CVE-2010-2858.title: Boesch IT-Consulting Simpnews news.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-2858.body: Boesch IT-Consulting Simpnews is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the news.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the layout or sortorder parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. CVE-2010-2860.title: EMC Celerra Network Attached Storage IP address unauthorized access
CVE-2010-2860.body: EMC Celerra Network Attached Storage could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system. By sending specially-crafted packets containing spoofed IP addresses, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to mount and gain full access to the exported NFS directory.Refer to the EMC Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2883.title: Adobe Reader cooltype.dll code execution
CVE-2010-2883.body: Adobe Reader could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in cooltype.dll. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.Refer to APSB10-21 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2010-2891.title: libsmi smiGetNode() buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2891.body: libsmi is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the smiGetNode() function when processing an Object Identifier (OID) in string-dotted notation. By sending an overly long string, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the libsmi SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2010-2905.title: BrotherScripts Scripts Directory search.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2905.body: BrotherScripts Scripts Directory is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search.php, info.php and articlesdetails.php scripts using the "s" or id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. Note: This vulnerability also affects ScriptsFeed Scrpts Directory.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2906.title: BrotherScripts Scripts Directory search.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2906.body: BrotherScripts Scripts Directory is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search.php, info.php and articlesdetails.php scripts using the "s" or id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. Note: This vulnerability also affects ScriptsFeed Scrpts Directory.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-2907.title: Huru Helpdesk component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-2907.body: Huruhelpdesk component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-2931.title: SigPlus Pro ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2010-2931.body: The SigPlus Pro ActiveX control is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. CVE-2010-2932.title: BarcodeWiz BarcodeWiz.dll ActiveX control LoadProperties() buffer overflow

CVE-2010-2933.title: AV Arcade index.php security bypass
CVE-2010-2933.body: AV Arcade could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of authentication cookies by the index.php script. CVE-2010-2940.title: Fedora SSSD LDAP security bypass
CVE-2010-2940.body: Fedora SSSD could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when authenticating against an LDAP server via a service that uses pam_authenticate. If the LDAP server allows unauthenticated binds, a remote attacker could send an empty password to bypass security restrictions to gain unauthorized access to the victim’s account.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the SSSD Trac Repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2941.title: CUPS cupsd code execution
CVE-2010-2941.body: CUPS could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the CUPS daemon (cupsd). By sending a specially-crafted IPP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the daemon to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of CUPS 1.3.7-18 or later), available from the CUPS Web site. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2952.title: Apache Traffic Server cache poisoning
CVE-2010-2952.body: Apache Traffic Server could allow a remote attacker to poison the DNS cache, caused by the improper randomization of the DNS transaction ID and the source port number. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to manipulate cache data and perform DNS Cache Poisoning.Upgrade to the latest version of Traffic Server (2.0.1 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-2954.title: Linux Kernel irda_bind() denial of service
CVE-2010-2954.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the irda_bind() function when attempting to free specific objects. By attempting to bind an AF_IRDA socket, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to panic the system or possibly gain elevated privileges.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the David Miller's GIT Repository. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-2996.title: RealPlayer RealMedia .IVR code execution
CVE-2010-2996.body: RealPlayer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an array-indexing error when parsing a RealMedia .IVR file. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file containing a malformed data header, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to dereference an object pointer to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of RealPlayer SP (1.1.5 or later), available from the RealNetworks Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-3000.title: RealPlayer SP ParseKnownType() code execution
CVE-2010-3000.body: RealPlayer SP could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by multiple integer overflows in the ParseKnownType() function when handling the HX_FLV_META_AMF_TYPE_MIXEDARRAY and HX_FLV_META_AMF_TYPE_ARRAY data types. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted FLV file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory to execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of RealPlayer SP (1.1.5 or later), available from the RealNetworks Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-3015.title: Linux Kernel stack size denial of service
CVE-2010-3015.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the incorrect setting of the maximum stack size for 32bit applications in a 64bit environment. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability using specially-crafted applications to cause the kernel to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-3067.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an integer overflow in the do_io_submit() function. CVE-2010-3208.body: Wiccle Web Builder is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ajax.php script. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-3210.body: Multi-lingual E-Commerce System could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. CVE-2010-3211.body: JE FAQ Pro component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-3212.body: Seagull PHP Framework is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-3213.body: Microsoft Exchange Server is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Outlook Web Access component. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Microsoft Exchange Server (2007 SP3 or later), available from the Microsoft Web site. CVE-2010-3262.title: Flock browser RSS feed cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-3262.body: The Flock browser could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions and execute arbitrary script on a victim's system, caused by the improper validation of user-supplied input when processing RSS feeds. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site containing a malicious RSS feed, a remote attacker could bypass same-origin policy restrictions and execute script in the context of another domain. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly perform cross-site scripting attacks and launch further attacks on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Flock (3.0.0.4114 or later), available from the Flock Web site. CVE-2010-3263.body: phpMyAdmin is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the setup script. CVE-2010-3350.body: bareFTP could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused insecure setting of LD_LIBRARY_PATH to a zero-length directory name. CVE-2010-3404.title: Eshtery multiple SQL injection
CVE-2010-3404.body: Eshtery is vulnerable to SQL injection. CVE-2010-3405.body: IBM AIX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the /usr/esa/sbin/sa_snap program. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-4694.title: gif2png GIF buffer overflow
CVE-2010-4694.body: gif2png is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when handling malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted GIF file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-4695.title: gif2png pathname file creation
CVE-2010-4695.body: gif2png could allow a remote attacker to create arbitrary files on the system, caused by the truncation of a GIF pathname specified on the command line. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted command-line argument to create PNG files in unintended directories.Upgrade to the latest version of Gif2png 2.5.4, available from the Gif2png Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-4697.title: PHP Zend engine code execution
CVE-2010-4697.body: PHP could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error in the Zend engine. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using attack vectors related to of __set, __get, __isset, and __unset methods to corrupt heap memory to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service.Refer to PHP Bug #52879 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2010-4700.title: PHP set_magic_quotes_runtime SQL injection
CVE-2010-4700.body: PHP is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the set_magic_quotes_runtime function, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of PHP 5.3.4, available from the PHP Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-4702.title: JRadio component for Joomla! unspecified SQL injection
CVE-2010-4702.body: JRadio component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using unknown vectors, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Joomla! JRadio (1.5.1 or later), available from the Joomla! Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-4707.title: Linux-PAM check_acl function denial of service
CVE-2010-4707.body: Linux-PAM is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper verification of whether a certain ACL file is a regular file. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability via a specially-crafted file to cause the consumption of system resources.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the ALT Linux Team git Repository. See References.

See References.

CVE-2010-4710.title: YUI Library addItem() cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-4710.body: YUI Library is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the addItem method in the Menu widget. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a field that is added to a menu to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of YUI (2.9.0 or later), available from the YUI Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-4719.title: JRadio component for Joomla! index.php file include
CVE-2010-4719.body: JRadio component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Joomla! JRadio (1.5.1 or later), available from the Joomla! Web site. See References.

A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the Admin password and gain unauthorized access to the application.S2 NetBox customers should contact S2 NetBox support for upgrade or patch information. See References.

CVE-2010-4875.title: Vodpod Video Gallery plugin for WordPress gid cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-4875.body: The Vodpod Video Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the vodpod_gallery_thumbs.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the gid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-4883.title: MODx modahsh parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-4883.body: MODx is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. If the victim is logged out, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the modahsh parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of MODx (2.0.3-pl or later), available from the MODx Web site. See References.
