CVE-2010-5041.title: NP_Gallery plugin for Nucleus CMS SQL Injection
CVE-2010-5041.body: NP_Gallery plugin for Nucleus CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5042.title: DJ-ArtGallery component for Joomla! index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-5042.body: The DJ-ArtGallery component for Joomla! is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using cid[] parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5043.title: DJ-ArtGallery component for Joomla! index.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-5043.body: The DJ-ArtGallery component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker with Public Back-end permissions could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the cid[] parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5045.title: Smart ASP Survey default.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-5045.body: Smart ASP Survey is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the default.asp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the catid parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5047.body: Press Release Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the page.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5050.title: ADManager Plus remote_share.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-5050.body: ADManager Plus is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the remote_share.jsp script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the computerName parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5055.title: Almnzm id SQL injection
CVE-2010-5055.body: Almnzm is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5056.body: The GBU Facebook component for Joomla! is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the face_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5057.body: CMS Ariadna is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the detResolucion.php script using the tipodoc_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5058.title: CMS Ariadna res_id SQL injection
CVE-2010-5058.body: CMS Ariadna is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the detResolucion.php script using the res_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5060.title: NUs Newssystem Nus.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-5060.body: NUs Newssystem is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the Nus.php script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5062.title: MH Products Kleinanzeigenmarkt search.php SQL injection
CVE-2010-5062.body: MH Products Kleinanzeigenmarkt is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search.php script using the "c" parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5078.title: SilverStripe silverstripe_version information disclosure
CVE-2010-5078.body: SilverStripe could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of version information in the silverstripe_version file with insecure permissions. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to display version information.Upgrade to the latest version of SilverStripe (2.4.4-rc1 or 2.3.10-rc or later), available from the SilverStripe Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-5083.title: PHP-Nuke Web_Links module url parameter SQL injection
CVE-2010-5083.body: The PHP-Nuke Web_Links module is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the modules.php script using the url parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5088.title: SilverStripe interfaces cross-site request forgery
CVE-2010-5088.body: SilverStripe is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by various CMS interfaces and classes based on TableListField or ComplexTableField. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of SilverStripe, (2.4.3-rc1 or 2.3.9-rc1 or later), available from the SilverStripe Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-5095.title: SilverStripe DataObjectSet cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-5095.body: SilverStripe is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the DataObjectSet pagination. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of SilverStripe (2.3.6 or later), available from the SilverStripe Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-5193.title: Image Viewer CP ActiveX control TifMergeMultiFiles() buffer overflow
CVE-2010-5193.body: The Image Viewer CP ActiveX control (ImageViewer2.ocx) is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long argument to an insecure TifMergeMultiFiles() method, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer or cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5278.title: MODx class_key parameter file include
CVE-2010-5278.body: MODx could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the tvs.php script using the class_key parameter, to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of MODx (2.0.3-pl or later), available from the MODx Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-5280.title: Community Builder Enhanced component for Joomla! file upload
CVE-2010-5280.body: The Community Builder Enhanced component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.Upgrade to the latest version of Community Builder Enhanced component for Joomla! (1.4.11 or later), available from the Joomla-CBE Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-5280.title: Community Builder Enhanced component for Joomla! index.php file include
CVE-2010-5280.body: The Community Builder Enhanced component for Joomla! could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the index.php script using the tabname parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of Community Builder Enhanced component for Joomla! (1.4.11 or later), available from the Joomla-CBE Web site. See References.

CVE-2010-5281.title: iBrowser ibrowser.php file include
CVE-2010-5281.body: iBrowser could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. If magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the ibrowser.php script using the lang parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5282.title: Open Text ECM multiple scripts cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-5282.body: Open Text ECM is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, available for registered users from the Open Text web site. See References.

CVE-2010-5287.title: Cornerstone CMS default.asp SQL injection
CVE-2010-5287.body: Cornerstone CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the default.asp script using the id parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2010-5312.title: jQuery UI title cross-site scripting
CVE-2010-5312.body: jQuery UI is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the title parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of jQuery UI(1.10.0 or later), available from the jQuery Web site. See References.
